carbonNeutral.heading: Carbon Neutral
carbonNeutral.description: Carbon neutral electricity for your business premises.

peaceOfMind.heading: Peace of mind
peaceOfMind.description: Your market energy charges won't increase for the fixed rate period. We'll let you know in advance before your market energy rates change.

discountOffTotalEnergyBill.description: Guaranteed discount that applies to your market energy charges.

variableRates.heading: Variable rates
variableRates.description: Your market energy charges are variable. We'll let you know in advance before your market energy charges change.

Credit50.VIC: Get up to $200 credit. Credits applied to first bill. $100 to electricity. $100 to gas.
Credit50.NSW: Get up to $400 credit. Credits applied to first bill. $200 to electricity. $200 to gas.
Credit50.QLD: Get a $200 credit. Credits applied to first bill. $200 to electricity.

referencePriceComparison.heading: Reference price comparison and estimated annual cost

VIC.description: # Comparison to the electricity reference price is indicative only and required by regulation. The reference price is an estimate of the annual amount that an average electricity customer in your distribution area would pay assuming average annual business usage (which may vary depending on the distribution area and tariff type). Our Basic Business plan is the reference price for most tariff types. Estimated annual cost is based on average annual usage and may not reflect how you will be charged. Your actual electricity costs will depend on your tariff type and the amount of electricity you use. Find out more about the reference price here.

VIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll let you know before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation.

NonVIC.description: ^^ Feed-in tariffs (FiT) are paid to eligible customers in accordance with our solar FiT Terms & Conditions, available here. We may vary our Retailer FiT rates and we'll let you know before this happens. Rates are GST-exclusive but we'll also pay you GST if you meet the requirements for GST registration for your solar generation.

VIC.heading: Account Credits
VIC.description: * Offer available to new VIC business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity or gas offer. Credits applied to first bill - $100 to new electricity account, $100 to new gas account. $200 credit if you sign up both your electricity and gas as new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

NSW.heading: Account Credits
NSW.description: * Offer available to new NSW business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity or gas offer. Credits applied to first bill - $200 to new electricity account, $200 to new gas account. $400 credit if you sign up both your electricity and gas as new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

QLD.heading: Account Credits
QLD.description: * Offer available to new QLD business accounts only who sign up to Total Plan Business electricity offer. Credits applied to first bill - $200 to new electricity account. $200 credit if you sign up your electricity as a new accounts. Credits are not transferable or redeemable for cash. We may change or end this offer at any time.

VIC.heading: Business Carbon Neutral Flexi
VIC.description: * Offer only for eligible VIC business customers. Not available in all areas or for all tariff types. Your energy charges will be variable including your solar feed-in tariffs & GreenPower but we will let you know before a rate change occurs. We may change or end this offer at any time. We will offset the carbon emissions from your electricity consumption under your eligible account on and from the supply start date. For more information on Business Carbon Neutral Flexi and for full terms visit https://www.energyaustralia.com.au/business/electricity-and-gas/small-business/business-carbon-neutral-flexi.

NSW.heading: Business Carbon Neutral Flexi
NSW.description: * Offer only for eligible NSW business customers. Not available in all areas or for all tariff types. Guaranteed discount is off our market energy charges and applies for the 12-month benefit period. Your energy charges will be variable including your solar feed-in tariffs & GreenPower but we will let you know before a rate change occurs. We may change or end this offer at any time. We will offset the carbon emissions from your electricity consumption under your eligible account on and from the supply start date. For more information on Business Carbon Neutral Flexi and for full terms visit https://www.energyaustralia.com.au/business/electricity-and-gas/small-business/business-carbon-neutral-flexi.
